declarations.name: API
LabelSizes
CustomLabel
Required
Optional
LabelWithInfoIcon
declarations.default:
{
  render: () => html`
    <style>
      form {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }
      sl-text-input {
        margin-block-end: 0.5rem;
      }
    </style>
    <form>
      <sl-label for="input1" size="sm" info="true">
        Label small
        <sl-icon slot="icon" name="info" size="xs" aria-describedby="tooltip"></sl-icon>
        <sl-tooltip slot="tooltip" id="tooltip">I am a tooltip for the info icon</sl-tooltip>
      </sl-label>
      <sl-text-input id="input1"></sl-text-input>
      <sl-label for="input2" size="md" info="true">
        Label medium
        <sl-icon slot="icon" name="info" size="sm" aria-describedby="tooltip1"></sl-icon>
        <sl-tooltip slot="tooltip" id="tooltip1">I am a tooltip for the info icon</sl-tooltip>
      </sl-label>
      <sl-text-input id="input2"></sl-text-input>
      <sl-label for="input3" size="lg" info="true">
        Label large
        <sl-icon slot="icon" name="info" size="md" aria-describedby="tooltip2"></sl-icon>
        <sl-tooltip slot="tooltip" id="tooltip2">I am a tooltip for the info icon</sl-tooltip>
      </sl-label>
      <sl-text-input id="input3" size="lg"></sl-text-input>
    </form>
  `
}

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the form control is disabled; when set no interaction is possible.

members.name: for
members.description: The DOM id of the form control this is linked to.

members.name: noPadding
members.description: Whether this label should have no padding bottom.

members.name: optional
members.description: Whether this label should be marked as optional.

members.name: required
members.description: Whether this label should be marked as required.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: The DOM id of the form control this is linked to.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the form control is disabled; when set no interaction is possible.

attributes.name: no-padding
attributes.description: Whether this label should have no padding bottom.

fields.name: #formControlId
fields.description: The actual form control id this label links to.

fields.name: #label
fields.description: The label instance in the light DOM.

fields.name: #observer
fields.description: Observe the form control for changes to the required attribute.

fields.name: optional
fields.description: Whether this label should be marked as optional.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Whether this label should be marked as required.
